name: SpongeMiner
description:
You control a submarine drone equipped with a laser to mine sponges.
All environment is generated randomly at runtime to increase replayability.

In development:

  • Spend sponges to upgrade max depth, add lights

Known issues:

  • Sponge healthbar is hidden by environment at times

CONTROLS
WASD - Move
LShift - Boost
Mouse1- Mine
MouseY/MScroll - Laser height
ESC - Return to menu
